page.title: 19CHILDRENS LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: "I like reading Enid Blyton books, specially the "Famous Five" books". "We've made a BMX track down by the Village Hall and I meet my friends there." "Near us there's a shop and my Mum is always sending me there to buy things for her cooking, like butter which costs 52p for half a kilo." "I like watching TV.. My favourite programme is Bonanza, it's about cowboys on a ranch in Americe." "The best thing I like doing is cam- ping.I went camping on Exmoor last year with the School and I'm going again this year." "I like going to my friend's house and playing on his computer. We play Dungeons and Dragons." "At the week-end I have to learn my spelligs ready for a test on Monday. Sometimes I have a table to learn too"
